0: Spacious room nice terrace wiev excellent staff far above the Crotian averageFitnes Spa area is nice with a big swimming pool two Finnish saunas and Turkish bath
The SPA is fantastic really spacious and clean with a lovely indoor pool steam room sauna ice bucket shower plunge pool and relax room
It has lovely views from the restaurants the spa seemed quite nice and the front desk staff was helpful

For people traveling with kids there are some restaurants along the second road which have trampolines and play areas we went for a fresh orange juice and let the kids play we really liked and the kids loved it
Gorgeous location Lovely attentive staff Clean Modern room Great spa fitness area Terrific meals
A mixed bag the shared facilities bars restaurants pool and spa are very stylish and relaxing
The spa and indoor pool area was lovely and very relaxing
excellent staff very helpful and polite food and spa are great vith superb service
Everything was amazing beautiful room wonderful spa and bar with really nice staff
1: The gym is not nearly as nice or big as the pictures show
There are two dipping pools in front of the Sauna
Morning broke and we were at the Spa
The wellness area appears dated from a design interior fit out perspective but it is functional and clean
We did not have time to use the spa or the gym but one of the unique features of the hotel is the beach area
There are no handrails on the hotels steps either which leads to the promenade and there are alot of steps which tests your fitness levels if walking back via the promenade from the old town
There is a separate area for adults only with 2 saunas 1 steam bath and small warmhot pools

You have to pay for every single thing extra which should be included in a 4 star hotel it would be worth it if it would have a nice service or if they wouldn‘t promise wrong things like a huge spa with huge facilities that is not the case

The hotel itself and food was great but the staff at the spa were rude and kicked my kids out for swimming in the indoor pool which we were told kids were aloud in and also one of the hot tubs had turned orange and I asked the staff what it was because I was worried and they told us it was just dirty which is disgusting that they would n’t even clean it
The spa services were excellent but pricey
